00045 typedef enum TPVTerminalType
00046 {
00047     PV_323,/* based on H.323 */
00048     PV_324M, /* based on H.324m */
00049     PV_SIP, /* based on SIP */
00050     PV_TERMINAL_TYPE_NONE
00051 } PV2WayTerminalType;
00052 
00058 typedef enum TPVLoopbackMode
00059 {
00060     PV_LOOPBACK_NONE,
00061     PV_LOOPBACK_COMM, /* Loops back from Comm source to Comm sink */
00062     PV_LOOPBACK_ENGINE, /* Loops back media at the engine level, no mux involved */
00063     PV_LOOPBACK_MUX /* Loops back at the output of the mux */
00064 } PV2WayLoopbackMode;
00065
